profile_data.summary:
Passionate about transforming raw data into strategic growth opportunities, I am a Data Analytics Manager with a proven track record of leveraging analytical skills to drive business success. With 7 years of experience in the field, I specialize in extracting meaningful patterns from complex datasets, guiding strategic decisions, and optimizing business processes. I leverage Artificial Intelligence (AI) to generate insights and recommendations, empowering businesses to expand and adopt a more data-driven approach to decision-making. I also have excellent interpersonal and communication skills that are essential to interact with all levels of management across all the functions. I thrive in collaborative environments, enjoy tackling complex projects, and use data-driven strategies to drive meaningful impact.


--- Domain Experience ---
Digital Advertising
Marketing
Real Estate
eCommerce
Consumer Packaged Goods
Health Care/Pharmaceutical Manufacturing
Financial Services
Information Technology (IT) Services
Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain & Storage
Airlines & Aviation 

--- Tools ---
• Artificial Intelligence (AI)
• SQL 
• Python (libraries: Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Scikit-learn, Beautiful Soup, NLTK)
• Jupyter Notebook
• R
• MS Azure (Storage Blob container, Resource Groups, Storage Accounts, SQL Database, Data Factories, Key Vaults) 
• Google Cloud Platform (BigQuery, Data Studio/Looker Studio, Cloud Functions, Cloud Storage, Cloud Shell scripting, Pub/Sub)
• JIRA (Bug/Issue Tracking, Project Management, Feature releases, Documentation)
• Excel (Vlookup, Macros, Pivot)
• Social listening/Analytics tools: Talkwalker, Cision, Infegy, Similarweb

Data Visualization:

• Tableau 
• Datorama
• Power BI
• Google Data Studio/Looker


--- Methodologies ---
• Scrum
• Agile

--- Delivery / Development ---
• Requirements Gathering
• Data Modeling
• ETL Pipeline (Creation, Deployment, Maintenance)
• Data Warehousing
• Data Preparation (Clean-up, Outlier Detection, Data Labeling, Validation, Quality Assurance (QA))
• Identify Insights
• Trend Analysis 
• Sales Forecasting
• Customer Analysis
• Campaign Performance Analysis (Cross-channel)
• Provide Recommendations 
• Social Media Analysis
• Campaign Management
• Social listening 
• Sentiment Analysis 
• Public Relations & Influencer Analysis 
• Competitor Analysis
• New Business (Market Research, Strategic Planning)


--- Soft Skills ---
• Stakeholder Management
• Cross-functional Teamwork
• Collaboration
• Problem Solving
• Time Management
• Leadership 
• Customer Success
• Project Management
profile_data.headline: Data Analytics Manager | LinkedIn Top Data Visualization Voice |  Marketing Analytics | Business Intelligence | Business Analysis

experience.description:
• Serve as the main analytics liaison for 10+ clients, delivering timely reports and insights that enhanced decision-making and client satisfaction, resulting in a 15% increase in client retention
• Streamline project management processes, achieving 98% adherence to timelines within 6 months, while enhancing report accuracy by 20% through detailed quality checks
• Developed and implemented Python scripts to automate reporting processes, reducing manual effort by 45% and allowing the team to focus on higher-value projects and strategic initiatives
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to optimize campaign strategies, resulting in a 40% boost in client satisfaction and engagement across all campaigns
• New Business (Market Research, Strategic Planning)
• Sentiment Analysis 
• Public Relations & Influencer Analysis 
• Competitor/Competitive Analysis
• Social Media Analysis
experience.title: Data Analytics Manager

experience.locationName: New York, New York, United States
experience.geoLocationName: New York, New York, United States
experience.description:
• Serve as a key liaison between business and technical teams for daily data analytics management
• With the help of Artificial Intelligence (AI) generating insights and recommendations
• Facilitated feedback sessions with clients to review deliverables, incorporating their input and suggestions to enhance results and ensure alignment with expectations
• Managed and motivated teams of professionals with diverse skills and backgrounds, fostering a collaborative and high-performing work environment
• Collaborate with business verticals to identify growth opportunities by developing reporting and analytics capabilities, crafting strategic roadmaps, and defining business requirements to support their long-term business objectives
• Integrated BigQuery with visualization tools like Google Data Studio/Looker Studio enabling seamless representation of analytical findings for stakeholders
• Performed quality assurance testing, created test cases and test plans for data warehouse projects
• Created data models for data integration from data warehouse, API, Email, S3 and SFTP, enforced data quality and data management policies for all the changes made to the data pipelines in multiple database systems.
• Provided mentorship and training to team members, resulting in improved performance and professional growth
• Ability to execute multiple projects and work with multiple audit teams simultaneously.
• Leveraged Wrike's features for real-time collaboration, resource allocation, and progress tracking, contributing to enhanced team productivity and project delivery timelines.
experience.title: Analytics Manager

experience.locationName: New York, New York, United States
experience.geoLocationName: New York, New York, United States
experience.description:
• Extract and organize data from a multitude of sources to feed business-improving insights (campaign performance, social listening, competitive analysis …) and optimize business outcomes
• Build thoughtful presentations/reports to deliver the right performance narrative to clients
• Partner with internal teams across all functions to learn the most efficient and effective way to extract value from data and develop a story telling approach 
• Provide optimization recommendation to clients to support the most efficient and effective channels, partners, and tactics
• Identify gaps/requirements from a measurement standpoint
• Analyze and interpret social media platform metrics for Twitter, TikTok, Pinterest, Snapchat, Facebook/Meta, Instagram, YouTube and LinkedIn to mine actionable insights
• With strong written and communication skills, including crafting and presenting data-driven analyses and insights to articulate performance and opportunities to the key stakeholders
experience.title: Senior Data Analyst

experience.description:
• Analyze media performance data to uncover actionable insights which can be used to provide learnings and recommendations to the Client Leadership team
• Use Statistical and Data Mining methods to project and explain media campaign performance
• Create pipeline to gather, store, and maintain log-level campaign data from various digital channels in compliance with current data privacy laws. Data sources include Ad Server, DSP, Ad Verification, Data cleanrooms, 1st party CRM data, 3rd party benchmarks and beyond 
• Identify KPIs and benchmarks related with campaign success and goals 
• Visualize and communicate key trends and relationships and articulate actionable insights 
• Design, develop and distribute reports and dashboards and automate process
• Experience in data preparation, data analysis, data visualization, programming, database administration, and reporting
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
• Ability to effectively interact with all levels of the organization’s management to deliver on business objectives
• Strong verbal, presentation and written communication skills
